text: This is a list of men's national basketball team players who represented Serbia at the EuroBasket, the FIBA Basketball World Cup, and the Summer Olympics. Since 2006, the Serbia squad has participated at six EuroBasket tournaments (2007, 2009, 2011, 2013, 2015, 2017), three Basketball World Cups (2010, 2014, 2019) and the 2016 Summer Olympics. Guard Stefan Marković holds the records of eight tournaments played in total and in a row. In this list are not included players that: * played at the qualification tournaments for named competitions, the Mediterranean Games, and other minor tournaments, * represented Serbia and Montenegro
